detail_desc: Single-breasted jacket in a checked weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
